items.title: Is a new AI paradigm based on raw electromagnetic waves feasible?
items.raw_excerpt:
*Is a new AI paradigm based on raw electromagnetic waves feasible?* Hi HN, I’d like to propose a new, theoretical AI paradigm I'm calling wAI (Wave AI). Unlike traditional AI that learns from human-interpretable data (text, images, audio), wAI would learn directly from raw electromagnetic wave patterns. The core vision is to unlock dimensions of reality and information that are invisible to human perception. By analyzing raw wave data, a wAI could potentially decode communication between animals and plants, detect hidden bio-signals for early disease diagnostics, or even explore new cosmic phenomena. This isn’t just about making a faster AI; it's about giving intelligence a completely new sensory dimension. I know this is highly speculative. The main challenges are immense:
* How do we def

title_i18n.zh: 基于原始电磁波的新人工智能范式是否可行？
title_i18n.es: ¿Es viable un nuevo paradigma de inteligencia artificial basado en ondas electromagnéticas en bruto?

items.title: Reaching Across the Isles: UK-LLM Brings AI to UK Languages With NVIDIA Nemotron
items.raw_excerpt: Celtic languages — including Cornish, Irish, Scottish Gaelic and Welsh — are the U.K.’s oldest living languages. To empower their speakers, the UK-LLM sovereign AI initiative is building an AI model based on NVIDIA Nemotron that can reason in both English and Welsh, a language spoken by about 850,000 people in Wales today. Enabling high-quality Read Article

title_i18n.en: Reaching Across the Isles: UK-LLM Brings AI to UK Languages With NVIDIA Nemotron
title_i18n.zh: 跨越群岛：英国大语言模型借助英伟达Nemotron为本土语言带来人工智能
title_i18n.es: Tendiendo Puentes Entre las Islas: UK-LLM Lleva la IA a los Idiomas del Reino Unido Con NVIDIA Nemotron

excerpt_i18n.en: Celtic languages — including Cornish, Irish, Scottish Gaelic and Welsh — are the U.K.’s oldest living languages. To empower their speakers, the UK-LLM sovereign AI initiative is building an AI model based on NVIDIA Nemotron that can reason in both English and Welsh, a language spoken by about 850,000 people in Wales today. Enabling high-quality Read Article
excerpt_i18n.zh: 凯尔特语系——包括康沃尔语、爱尔兰语、苏格兰盖尔语和威尔士语——是英国现存最古老的语言。为增强使用者能力，英国主权AI计划UK-LLM正基于英伟达Nemot构建人工智能模型。
excerpt_i18n.es: Las lenguas celtas —incluyendo el córnico, el irlandés, el gaélico escocés y el galés— son las lenguas vivas más antiguas del Reino Unido. Para empoderar a sus hablantes, la iniciativa de inteligencia artificial soberana UK-LLM está construyendo un modelo de IA basado en NVIDIA Nemot.

items.title: Show HN: Mystwright – AI generates dynamic murder mysteries you can solve
items.raw_excerpt: I built Mystwright, an AI-powered "murder" mystery game engine. (Other mystery types are possible too! But I'm still working on making those feel right.) Instead of pre-written cases, Mystwright procedurally generates a world, a crime, and a cast of suspects — each with unique motives, relationships, and secrets. You investigate in any order: interview suspects, search for clues, follow leads. The story adapts as you play. Core mechanics: - Procedural mystery generation (no two games are the same) - Seeded mystery worlds - Procedural dialogue generation - Distinct character personalities - Consistent timelines and evidence trails - Generative voice dialogue - Location exploration experiments are underway I'd love feedback on: - Does the mystery feel engaging/coherent? - Ideas for mechanics

title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：Mystwright——AI生成可破解的动态谋杀谜案

items.title: I Wasn’t Sure I Wanted Anthropic to Pay Me for My Books—I Do Now
items.raw_excerpt: Anthropic agreed to a $1.5 billion settlement for authors whose books were used to train its AI model. As an author who fits that description, I’ve come around to the idea.

title_i18n.en: I Wasn’t Sure I Wanted Anthropic to Pay Me for My Books—I Do Now
title_i18n.zh: 我曾不确定是否该让Anthropic为我的书付费——现在确定了。
title_i18n.es: No estaba segura de querer que Anthropic me pagara por mis libros, pero ahora sí.

excerpt_i18n.en: Anthropic agreed to a $1.5 billion settlement for authors whose books were used to train its AI model. As an author who fits that description, I’ve come around to the idea.
excerpt_i18n.zh: Anthropic同意向用于训练其AI模型的书籍作者支付15亿美元和解金。作为符合描述的作者，我最终接受了这一安排。
excerpt_i18n.es: Anthropic acordó un acuerdo de 1500 millones de dólares para los autores cuyos libros se utilizaron para entrenar su modelo de IA. Como autor que encaja en esa descripción, he terminado por aceptar la idea.

items.title: Working with US CAISI and UK AISI to build more secure AI systems
items.raw_excerpt: OpenAI shares progress on the partnership with the US CAISI and UK AISI to strengthen AI safety and security. The collaboration is setting new standards for responsible frontier AI deployment through joint red-teaming, biosecurity safeguards, and agentic system testing.

title_i18n.en: Working with US CAISI and UK AISI to build more secure AI systems
title_i18n.zh: 与美国CAISI和英国AISI合作构建更安全的AI系统
title_i18n.es: Trabajando con US CAISI y UK AISI para construir sistemas de IA más seguros.

excerpt_i18n.en: OpenAI shares progress on the partnership with the US CAISI and UK AISI to strengthen AI safety and security. The collaboration is setting new standards for responsible frontier AI deployment through joint red-teaming, biosecurity safeguards, and agentic system testing.
excerpt_i18n.zh: OpenAI分享了与美国CAISI和英国AISI合作加强AI安全与保障的进展。通过联合红队测试，该合作正在为负责任的前沿AI部署制定新标准。
excerpt_i18n.es: OpenAI comparte avances sobre la colaboración con la CAISI de Estados Unidos y la AISI del Reino Unido para reforzar la seguridad de la inteligencia artificial. La cooperación está estableciendo nuevos estándares para el despliegue responsable de inteligencia artificial fronteriza mediante ejercicios conjuntos de equipo rojo,

items.title: 以数生智、以智驭数，矩阵起源产品发布会圆满落幕
items.raw_excerpt: 2025年9月12日，中国·上海】——今日，矩阵起源在上海隆重举办以 “ 以数生智、以智驭数 ” 为主题的新品发布会，正式推出两款战略级核心产品： 超融合异构云原生数据库 MatrixOne (MO) 与 AI原生多模态数据智能平台 MatrixOne Intelligence (MOI)。 发布会吸引了来自制造、金融、能源、互联网等行业的企业代表和媒体，围绕 AI 行业趋势、数据智能发展及落地挑战展开深入探讨。 矩阵起源 CEO 王龙在开场主题演讲《以数生智，以智驭数——数据飞轮提供AI时代的澎湃动力》中指出，当前 AI 行业正经历从模型能力不足到基础设施不足的转变，核心业务 AI 的价值实现率仍仅 5%。他强调，企业落地 AI 的关键在于解决数据割裂问题，通过数据智能飞轮构建 AI 驱动的数据反馈循环，提升落地效率并释放业务价值。 “AI 不是孤立的模型，而是以数据为核心的智能生态。构建数据智能飞轮，让数据生智、智能反哺数据，才能真正实现可落地的业务价值。”——王龙   两大核心产品，构建数据智能基石 超融合数据库 MatrixOne（MO），重塑企业 AI 时代的数据底座 矩阵起源 MatrixOne 内核研发负责人徐鹏在分享时表示，传统数据开发常被比作人类大脑的“婴儿期”，数据潜能远未被充分激活，而 MatrixOne 则为企业提供了一个可演进、可集成、可扩展的数据底座，全面释放沉睡数据的价值。 MatrixOne 的核心是 超融合架构 ，将 HTAP（混合事务/分析处理）、流处理、向量检索、全文搜索原生整合到同一引擎中，从根本上消除了长期困扰企业的数据孤岛问题。而平台的另一大创新是引入 “ 数据的Git”新范式 ：通过将版本管理、分支、回滚、审计等软件工程理念引入数据管理，显著缩短了 AI 项目的开发周期，并加速跨团队协作，极大提升企业在复杂数据场景下的

title_i18n.zh: 以数生智、以智驭数，矩阵起源产品发布会圆满落幕
title_i18n.en: With data generating intelligence and intelligence harnessing data, the Matrix Origin product launch event has concluded successfully.
title_i18n.es: Con números nace la inteligencia, con inteligencia se dominan los números. La presentación de productos de Matrix Origin ha concluido con éxito.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 2025年9月12日，中国·上海】——今日，矩阵起源在上海隆重举办以 “ 以数生智、以智驭数 ” 为主题的新品发布会，正式推出两款战略级核心产品： 超融合异构云原生数据库 MatrixOne (MO) 与 AI原生多模态数据智能平台 MatrixOne Intelligence (MOI)。 发布会吸引了来自制造、金融、能源、互联网等行业的企业代表和媒体，围绕 AI 行业趋势、数据智能发展及落地挑战展开深入探讨。 矩阵起源 CEO 王龙在开场主题演讲《以数生智，以智驭数——数据飞轮提供AI时代的澎湃动力》中指出，当前 AI 行业正经历从模型能力不足到基础设施不足的转变，核心业务 AI 的价值实现率仍仅 5%。他强调，企业落地 AI 的关键在于解决数据割裂问题，通过数据智能飞轮构建 AI 驱动的数据反馈循环，提升落地效率并释放业务价值。 “AI 不是孤立的模型，而是以数据为核心的智能生态。构建数据智能飞轮，让数据生智、智能反哺数据，才能真正实现可落地的业务价值。”——王龙   两大核心产品，构建数据智能基石 超融合数据库 MatrixOne（MO），重塑企业 AI 时代的数据底座 矩阵起源 MatrixOne 内核研发负责人徐鹏在分享时表示，传统数据开发常被比作人类大脑的“婴儿期”，数据潜能远未被充分激活，而 MatrixOne 则为企业提供了一个可演进、可集成、可扩展的数据底座，全面释放沉睡数据的价值。 MatrixOne 的核心是 超融合架构 ，将 HTAP（混合事务/分析处理）、流处理、向量检索、全文搜索原生整合到同一引擎中，从根本上消除了长期困扰企业的数据孤岛问题。而平台的另一大创新是引入 “ 数据的Git”新范式 ：通过将版本管理、分支、回滚、审计等软件工程理念引入数据管理，显著缩短了 AI 项目的开发周期，并加速跨团队协作，极大提升企业在复杂数据场景下的
excerpt_i18n.en:
September 12, 2025, Shanghai, China — Matrix Origin today held a grand product launch in Shanghai under the theme "Data Generates Intelligence, Intelligence Harnesses Data," officially introducing two strategic core products: the hyper-converged heterogeneous cloud-native database MatrixOne (MO) and the AI-native multimodal data intelligence platform MatrixOne Intelligence (MOI). The event attracted enterprise representatives and media from industries such as manufacturing, finance, energy, and the internet, who engaged in in-depth discussions on AI industry trends, data intelligence development, and implementation challenges.  

In the opening keynote speech titled "Data Generates Intelligence, Intelligence Harnesses Data—The Data Flywheel Powers the AI Era," Matrix Origin CEO Wang Long pointed out that the AI industry is currently transitioning from insufficient model capabilities to inadequate infrastructure, with the value realization rate of core business AI still at just 5%. He emphasized that the key to enterprise AI implementation lies in resolving data fragmentation issues, building an AI-driven data feedback loop through the data intelligence flywheel to enhance implementation efficiency and unlock business value.  

"AI is not an isolated model but an intelligence ecosystem centered on data. Building a data intelligence flywheel, where data generates intelligence and intelligence feeds back into data, is essential to achieving tangible business value." — Wang Long  

Two Core Products Building the Foundation of Data Intelligence  
The hyper-converged database MatrixOne (MO) redefines the data foundation for enterprises in the AI era.
excerpt_i18n.es: 12 de septiembre de 2025, Shanghái, China — Hoy, Matrix Origin celebró solemnemente en Shanghái la conferencia de lanzamiento de nuevos productos bajo el tema "Generar inteligencia con datos, dominar datos con inteligencia", presentando oficialmente dos productos estratégicos centrales: la base de datos nativa en la nube hiperconvergente y heterogénea MatrixOne (MO) y la plataforma de inteligencia de datos multimodal nativa para IA MatrixOne Intelligence (MOI). El evento atrajo a representantes empresariales y medios de comunicación de sectores como manufactura, finanzas, energía e internet, quienes debatieron en profundidad sobre tendencias de la industria de IA, desarrollo de inteligencia de datos y desafíos de implementación. Wang Long, CEO de Matrix Origin.

items.title: Announcing OpenAI Grove
items.raw_excerpt: Applications are now open for OpenAI Grove, a 5-week founder program designed for individuals at any stage, from pre-idea to product. Participants receive $50K in API credits, early access to AI tools, and hands-on mentorship from the OpenAI team.

title_i18n.en: Announcing OpenAI Grove
title_i18n.zh: OpenAI Grove 正式发布
title_i18n.es: Presentamos OpenAI Grove.

excerpt_i18n.en: Applications are now open for OpenAI Grove, a 5-week founder program designed for individuals at any stage, from pre-idea to product. Participants receive $50K in API credits, early access to AI tools, and hands-on mentorship from the OpenAI team.
excerpt_i18n.zh: OpenAI Grove创始人项目现已开放申请，为期五周，面向从创意萌芽到产品成型的各阶段创业者。参与者将获得5万美元API额度、AI工具优先使用权及实践指导。
excerpt_i18n.es: Ya están abiertas las solicitudes para OpenAI Grove, un programa de emprendedores de 5 semanas diseñado para personas en cualquier etapa, desde la preidea hasta el producto. Los participantes reciben 50.000 dólares en créditos de API, acceso anticipado a herramientas de IA y tutoría práctica.

items.title: 蚂蚁集团与浙商银行达成深化战略合作：共创金融科技新生态
items.raw_excerpt: 9月12日，蚂蚁集团与浙商银行签署深化战略合作协议，双方将在金融科技、基础技术、公司金融、零售金融、金融市场、普惠金融等领域持续深化合作，携手以AI为引擎探索金融业发展新动能，努力为社会创造更多的价值。  自2022年起，浙商银行即开启数字化改革，将其作为全行战略重点之一。当前为进一步提升转型质效，浙商银行计划开展AI三年行动和数据治理三年行动，目前已逐步探索打造了超级智能助手“浙小智”、“浙银金市存单做市”AI机器人等一批AI应用场景。 自2023年提出“AI First”战略以来，蚂蚁集团坚定聚焦AI应用，以“让AI像扫码支付一样便利每个人的生活”为愿景，专注于医疗、金融、生活三大场景。面向未来，蚂蚁积极布局智能体领域，为AI大模型释放生产力做探索。 根据协议，双方将积极推进在AI智能体建设及应用、大模型防御、分布式微服务体系、数据库等金融科技以及财富管理、小微贷款、供应链金融等业务方面的合作，共建数智金融生态。 浙商银行党委委员、监事长郭定方表示，“未来将与蚂蚁等领先的科技企业携手，持续推动人工智能技术嵌入银行核心业务流程、客户服务、风险管理和运营决策等各个环节，对银行的商业模式、服务场景、产品设计和内部运营进行全面重塑，形成数字银行新业态。” 蚂蚁集团资深副总裁、蚂蚁数科首席执行官赵闻飙表示，“此次合作将进一步发挥双方在各自领域的优势。蚂蚁集团将继续秉持‘AI First’的战略，与浙商银行共同探索和实践AI技术的创新应用，推动数智生态的建设，为行业和用户创造更大的价值。” 目前，蚂蚁集团旗下的数字科技解决方案正在深度参与多个行业升级。蚂蚁数科AI业务以行业大模型技术和可信智能体技术为双引擎，提供从行业模型、AI平台到上层应用的全栈式解决方案。其中在金融领域，蚂蚁数科累计已服务100%的国有股份制银行、超60%的城商行，数百家金融机构，支持金融业高效数智化

title_i18n.zh: 蚂蚁集团与浙商银行达成深化战略合作：共创金融科技新生态
title_i18n.en: Ant Group and China Zheshang Bank have reached an agreement to deepen their strategic cooperation: jointly creating a new ecosystem for financial technology.
title_i18n.es: El Grupo Ant y el Banco de Zhejiang acuerdan profundizar su cooperación estratégica: Crear conjuntamente un nuevo ecosistema de tecnología financiera.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 9月12日，蚂蚁集团与浙商银行签署深化战略合作协议，双方将在金融科技、基础技术、公司金融、零售金融、金融市场、普惠金融等领域持续深化合作，携手以AI为引擎探索金融业发展新动能，努力为社会创造更多的价值。  自2022年起，浙商银行即开启数字化改革，将其作为全行战略重点之一。当前为进一步提升转型质效，浙商银行计划开展AI三年行动和数据治理三年行动，目前已逐步探索打造了超级智能助手“浙小智”、“浙银金市存单做市”AI机器人等一批AI应用场景。 自2023年提出“AI First”战略以来，蚂蚁集团坚定聚焦AI应用，以“让AI像扫码支付一样便利每个人的生活”为愿景，专注于医疗、金融、生活三大场景。面向未来，蚂蚁积极布局智能体领域，为AI大模型释放生产力做探索。 根据协议，双方将积极推进在AI智能体建设及应用、大模型防御、分布式微服务体系、数据库等金融科技以及财富管理、小微贷款、供应链金融等业务方面的合作，共建数智金融生态。 浙商银行党委委员、监事长郭定方表示，“未来将与蚂蚁等领先的科技企业携手，持续推动人工智能技术嵌入银行核心业务流程、客户服务、风险管理和运营决策等各个环节，对银行的商业模式、服务场景、产品设计和内部运营进行全面重塑，形成数字银行新业态。” 蚂蚁集团资深副总裁、蚂蚁数科首席执行官赵闻飙表示，“此次合作将进一步发挥双方在各自领域的优势。蚂蚁集团将继续秉持‘AI First’的战略，与浙商银行共同探索和实践AI技术的创新应用，推动数智生态的建设，为行业和用户创造更大的价值。” 目前，蚂蚁集团旗下的数字科技解决方案正在深度参与多个行业升级。蚂蚁数科AI业务以行业大模型技术和可信智能体技术为双引擎，提供从行业模型、AI平台到上层应用的全栈式解决方案。其中在金融领域，蚂蚁数科累计已服务100%的国有股份制银行、超60%的城商行，数百家金融机构，支持金融业高效数智化
excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 12, Ant Group and China Zheshang Bank signed an agreement to deepen their strategic cooperation. The two parties will continue to enhance collaboration in areas including fintech, foundational technologies, corporate finance, retail finance, financial markets, and inclusive finance. Together, they will explore new drivers for the financial industry using AI as an engine, striving to create more value for society.

Since 2022, China Zheshang Bank has initiated digital reform as one of its key strategic priorities. To further improve the quality and efficiency of this transformation, the bank plans to launch a three-year AI initiative and a three-year data governance initiative. It has already developed several AI application scenarios, such as the super intelligent assistant "Zhe Xiaozhi" and the AI robot for "Zheyin Jinshi Certificate of Deposit Market Making."

Since proposing its "AI First" strategy in 2023, Ant Group has remained firmly focused on AI applications, with a vision to "make AI as convenient as scan-to-pay in everyone's daily life," concentrating on healthcare, finance, and lifestyle scenarios. Looking ahead, Ant is actively advancing in the field of intelligent agents, exploring ways to unleash the productivity of large AI models.

Under the agreement, the two parties will actively promote cooperation in fintech areas such as AI intelligent agent development and application, large model defense, distributed microservices architecture, and databases, as well as in business areas including wealth management, small and micro loans, and supply chain finance, jointly building a digital and intelligent financial ecosystem.

Guo Dingfang, Member of the Party Committee and Chairman of the Board of Supervisors of China Zheshang Bank, stated, "In the future, we will work with leading tech companies like Ant to continuously integrate AI technology into all aspects of the bank's core business processes, customer service, risk management, and operational decision-making."
excerpt_i18n.es: El 12 de septiembre, Ant Group y China Zheshang Bank firmaron un acuerdo para profundizar su cooperación estratégica. Ambas partes continuarán intensificando la colaboración en áreas como tecnología financiera, tecnología básica, finanzas corporativas, banca minorista, mercados financieros y finanzas inclusivas. Juntos explorarán nuevos impulsos para el desarrollo del sector financiero utilizando la IA como motor, esforzándose por crear más valor para la sociedad. Desde 2022, China Zheshang Bank inició una reforma digital, convirtiéndola en uno de los focos estratégicos de la entidad. Actualmente, para mejorar aún más la calidad y eficiencia de la transformación, el banco planea implementar un plan de acción de tres años para IA y otro de tres años para gobernanza de datos. Hasta ahora, ha explorado gradualmente el desarrollo de herramientas como el superasistente inteligente "Zhe Xiaozhi" y el robot de IA "Market Maker de Certificados de Depósito del Mercado Monetario de Zheshang Bank", entre otras aplicaciones de IA.

items.title: Show HN: CLAVIER-36 – A programming environment for generative music
items.raw_excerpt: CLAVIER-36 is a programming environment for generative music. Programs are laid out in a two-dimensional grid, and evolve over time according to a fixed set of rules. The system is much like a cellular automaton, in that most of the rules governing the evolution of the system are local. C36 programs describe sequences of discrete events in time. The environment includes a primitive sampler, as a self-contained means of interpreting these events as sound. For full expressivity, though, the system is best used as a generator of data for interpretation by an external musical instrument, such as a synthesizer. The project was very directly inspired by Orca ( https://100r.co/site/orca.html ). It began as my own from-scratch implementation of Orca and diverged over time. It's written in C, and c

title_i18n.en: Show HN: CLAVIER-36 – A programming environment for generative music
title_i18n.zh: HN展示：CLAVIER-36——生成式音乐编程环境
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: CLAVIER-36 – Un entorno de programación para música generativa

excerpt_i18n.en: CLAVIER-36 is a programming environment for generative music. Programs are laid out in a two-dimensional grid, and evolve over time according to a fixed set of rules. The system is much like a cellular automaton, in that most of the rules governing the evolution of the system are local. C36 programs describe sequences of discrete events in time. The environment includes a primitive sampler, as a self-contained means of interpreting these events as sound. For full expressivity, though, the system is best used as a generator of data for interpretation by an external musical instrument, such as a synthesizer. The project was very directly inspired by Orca ( https://100r.co/site/orca.html ). It began as my own from-scratch implementation of Orca and diverged over time. It's written in C, and c
excerpt_i18n.zh: CLAVIER-36是一个用于生成式音乐的程序环境。程序以二维网格形式布局，并根据固定规则随时间演化。该系统非常类似于细胞自动机。

items.title: 外滩大会热议智能体应用 Lovart陈冕：智能体产品应该“天生全球化”
items.raw_excerpt: 技术从大模型跃迁到多模态、AI Agent与具身智能，产业正处在技术奇点与商业爆发的交汇口。9月12日，在2025 Inclusion·外滩大会的“全球AI投资展望——AI创业的爆发与中国机遇”论坛上，围绕AI智能体的落地前景及投资逻辑，多位AI领域创业者、投资人展开观点交锋。 阶跃星辰创始人、CEO姜大昕认为，智能体正在金融、医疗、教育等垂直领域快速渗透，而下一代智能硬件的竞争焦点将是“会做事、总在场、有记忆、能进化”。“随着世界模型的建立，智能体终将从数字世界走向物理世界。走向物理世界能够从经验中学习，自主学习，并且和人类科学家一起发现人类还没有发现的物理规律。”   智能体时代是否已经降临？蚂蚁集团副总裁、战略投资及企业发展部总裁纪纲认为，随着大模型和智能体的技术水位抬升，业界对智能的期待已远超上一代的“检索+简单工作流”，甚至看到AI超越人类智慧的可能。设想身边有一位比自己更博学、且可全天候运转的“人”，那么几乎他可以做任何事。他表示，当前AI智能体的发展中，高容忍度场景如线下中介、情感陪伴等将优先落地，但需要精确数据来完成任务闭环的场景，这还需一个过程。 中国AI应用走在国际前列，在智能体落地中尤其明显，多个全球“首个智能体”来自中国。明势创投创始合伙人黄明明认为，“这是中国过去20年在互联网、移动互联网积累的大量产品经理的能力，同时对技术，我们又跟得很快。”他预测，未来全球最顶尖的智能体中将有三分之二来自中国创业团队。 BAI资本创始及管理合伙人龙宇则认为，我们并未迎来智能体爆发的时代。她指出，全世界以全面拥抱的姿态在非常宽容地对待AI向智能体发展的探索，但留给创业者调试优化的时间已经不多，市场对其交付完成度的要求越来越高，例如在金融场景下容错率极低。她认为，中美AI竞争中，中国创业者资源相对少，因此无论投资人、创业者，最好不要做同质化竞争，而是尽可能

title_i18n.zh: 外滩大会热议智能体应用 Lovart陈冕：智能体产品应该“天生全球化”
title_i18n.en: The Bund Conference Heatedly Discusses Agent Applications, Lovart's Chen Mian: Agent Products Should Be "Born Global"
title_i18n.es: La Cumbre del Bund debate las aplicaciones de agentes inteligentes. Chen Mian de Lovart: Los productos de agentes inteligentes deben ser globales por naturaleza.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 技术从大模型跃迁到多模态、AI Agent与具身智能，产业正处在技术奇点与商业爆发的交汇口。9月12日，在2025 Inclusion·外滩大会的“全球AI投资展望——AI创业的爆发与中国机遇”论坛上，围绕AI智能体的落地前景及投资逻辑，多位AI领域创业者、投资人展开观点交锋。 阶跃星辰创始人、CEO姜大昕认为，智能体正在金融、医疗、教育等垂直领域快速渗透，而下一代智能硬件的竞争焦点将是“会做事、总在场、有记忆、能进化”。“随着世界模型的建立，智能体终将从数字世界走向物理世界。走向物理世界能够从经验中学习，自主学习，并且和人类科学家一起发现人类还没有发现的物理规律。”   智能体时代是否已经降临？蚂蚁集团副总裁、战略投资及企业发展部总裁纪纲认为，随着大模型和智能体的技术水位抬升，业界对智能的期待已远超上一代的“检索+简单工作流”，甚至看到AI超越人类智慧的可能。设想身边有一位比自己更博学、且可全天候运转的“人”，那么几乎他可以做任何事。他表示，当前AI智能体的发展中，高容忍度场景如线下中介、情感陪伴等将优先落地，但需要精确数据来完成任务闭环的场景，这还需一个过程。 中国AI应用走在国际前列，在智能体落地中尤其明显，多个全球“首个智能体”来自中国。明势创投创始合伙人黄明明认为，“这是中国过去20年在互联网、移动互联网积累的大量产品经理的能力，同时对技术，我们又跟得很快。”他预测，未来全球最顶尖的智能体中将有三分之二来自中国创业团队。 BAI资本创始及管理合伙人龙宇则认为，我们并未迎来智能体爆发的时代。她指出，全世界以全面拥抱的姿态在非常宽容地对待AI向智能体发展的探索，但留给创业者调试优化的时间已经不多，市场对其交付完成度的要求越来越高，例如在金融场景下容错率极低。她认为，中美AI竞争中，中国创业者资源相对少，因此无论投资人、创业者，最好不要做同质化竞争，而是尽可能
excerpt_i18n.en: Technology is transitioning from large models to multimodal AI, AI agents, and embodied intelligence, with the industry at the intersection of a technological singularity and commercial explosion. On September 12, at the "Global AI Investment Outlook—The Boom in AI Entrepreneurship and China's Opportunities" forum of the 2025 Inclusion·Bund Conference, multiple AI entrepreneurs and investors debated the prospects and investment logic of AI agents. Jiang Daxin, founder and CEO of StepFun, stated that agents are rapidly penetrating vertical sectors like finance, healthcare, and education, with the next generation of smart hardware competition focusing on "capable, always present, memory-enabled, and evolvable." "With the establishment of world models, agents will eventually move from the digital to the physical world, learning from experience, self-teaching, and collaborating with human scientists to discover physical laws yet unknown to humanity." Has the era of agents arrived? Ji Gang, Ant Group Vice President and Head of Strategic Investment and Corporate Development, believes that as large models and agent technologies advance, industry expectations for intelligence far exceed the previous generation's "retrieval + simple workflows," even seeing potential for AI to surpass human wisdom. Imagine having someone more knowledgeable than oneself available around the clock—such an entity could handle almost anything. He noted that in current AI agent development, high-tolerance scenarios like offline intermediation and emotional companionship will be prioritized for implementation, but scenarios requiring precise data for task completion will take longer. items.title: Tucker Carlson asks Sam Altman if an OpenAI employee was murdered ‘on your orders’
items.raw_excerpt: While interviewing OpenAI CEO Sam Altman this week, former Fox News host Tucker Carlson brought up his belief in a conspiracy theory that former OpenAI researcher Suchir Balaji was “definitely murdered.” The researcher’s death in November 2024, which was ruled a suicide by the San Francisco police, followed his release of statements online and in […]

title_i18n.zh: 塔克·卡尔森询问山姆·阿尔特曼，是否有一名OpenAI员工是"按你的命令"被谋杀的。
title_i18n.es: Tucker Carlson le pregunta a Sam Altman si un empleado de OpenAI fue asesinado por sus órdenes.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 本周采访OpenAI首席执行官萨姆·阿尔特曼时，前福克斯新闻主持人塔克·卡尔森提及他相信一个阴谋论，即OpenAI前研究员苏奇尔·巴拉吉"肯定是被谋杀的"。这位研究员的
excerpt_i18n.es: Durante una entrevista con el director ejecutivo de OpenAI, Sam Altman, esta semana, el ex presentador de Fox News Tucker Carlson mencionó su creencia en una teoría de conspiración según la cual el ex investigador de OpenAI Suchir Balaji fue "definitivamente asesinado". items.title: Modder injects AI dialogue into 2002’s Animal Crossing using memory hack
items.raw_excerpt: Unofficial mod lets classic Nintendo GameCube title use AI chatbots with amusing results.

title_i18n.en: Modder injects AI dialogue into 2002’s Animal Crossing using memory hack
title_i18n.zh: 模组玩家通过内存破解为2002年的《动物森友会》注入AI对话功能。
title_i18n.es: Un modder inyecta diálogo de IA en Animal Crossing de 2002 mediante hackeo de memoria.

excerpt_i18n.en: Unofficial mod lets classic Nintendo GameCube title use AI chatbots with amusing results.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 非官方模组让经典任天堂GameCube游戏得以使用AI聊天机器人，带来有趣效果。
excerpt_i18n.es: Un mod no oficial permite que el clásico título de Nintendo GameCube utilice chatbots de IA con resultados divertidos.

items.title: Unlock model insights with log probability support for Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import
items.raw_excerpt: In this post, we explore how log probabilities work with imported models in Amazon Bedrock. You will learn what log probabilities are, how to enable them in your API calls, and how to interpret the returned data. We also highlight practical applications—from detecting potential hallucinations to optimizing RAG systems and evaluating fine-tuned models—that demonstrate how these insights can improve your AI applications, helping you build more trustworthy solutions with your custom models.

title_i18n.en: Unlock model insights with log probability support for Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import
title_i18n.zh: 借助Amazon Bedrock自定义模型导入的日志概率支持，解锁模型洞察。
title_i18n.es: Desbloquea perspectivas del modelo con soporte de probabilidad logarítmica para Amazon Bedrock Importación de Modelos Personalizados

excerpt_i18n.en: In this post, we explore how log probabilities work with imported models in Amazon Bedrock. You will learn what log probabilities are, how to enable them in your API calls, and how to interpret the returned data. We also highlight practical applications—from detecting potential hallucinations to optimizing RAG systems and evaluating fine-tuned models—that demonstrate how these insights can improve your AI applications, helping you build more trustworthy solutions with your custom models.
